pageContent: Background: Patients with localized prostate cancer (PCa) experience biochemical recurrence (BCR) despite a curatively intended radical prostatectomy (RP). The aim of this study was to describe the quality of life (QoL) of patients with a BCR while identifying predictors of early (ER) and late recurrence (LR).

metaData.source:
Assessment of suicidal behavior and factors associated with a diagnosis of prostate cancer
